summary: You can now craft all Three type(Black Brown and Grey) tpye of the thieves Guild Gear
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][u][b][size=6][/size][/b][/u][/font][size=6][u][b]CRAFTABLE/TEMPERABLE THIEVES GUILD ARMOR[/b][/u][/size][color=#ff0000]
[/color][size=5]BY ALFATOSSA

[size=3]You can now craft you own set of thieves guild armor easily by choosing them on the Leather tab and they are fully enchentable.
You got 3 sets:
-Brown (The one you get when you joined);
-Grey (Same as the one Tonilia is wearing);
-Black (Same as Mercer,Brynjolf,Delvin Mallory and Vex).[/size]

To craft the Black and Grey Set,You MUST buy Dyes From the Dye Maker Located in the Ragged Flagon.




[/size][/center]
author: Alfatossa
